Name: Undead Commuter
Stats: STR 14, DEX 10, CON 16, INT 3, WIS 10, CHA 6
Abilities: Lurching Swipe: +5 to hit, 1d10+2 bludgeoning damage. Infectious Bite: DC 13 CON save or become poisoned for 1 min. Thrash Reflex (Reaction): When reduced to 0 HP, make a final unarmed attack.

Name: Automaton Duelist
Stats: STR 12, DEX 18, CON 14, INT 10, WIS 12, CHA 8
Abilities: Quickdraw (First Round): Always goes first unless surprised. Revolver Barrage: Two ranged attacks (+6, 2d6+3 each). Ricochet Shot (Recharge 5â€“6): Bullet bounces to hit 2nd target within 10 ft of first.

Name: Illusionist Saboteur
Stats: STR 8, DEX 14, CON 12, INT 18, WIS 14, CHA 16
Abilities: Illusory Doppelganger: Creates an illusory copy of themselves. Attack rolls against them have disadvantage. Mind Maze: Once per round, can force one creature to make DC 15 INT save or lose their action. Spellcasting: Spell save DC 15, attack +7. Spells include: Minor Illusion, Mirror Image, Suggestion, Phantasmal Killer.
